title: Relates to requiring the notice of gluten content in foods being served in certain cafeterias
summary: Relates to requiring the notice of gluten content in foods being served in state owned, operated or leased cafeterias and all cafeterias operated by the state university of New York.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1124

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  PARKER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Health

       AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation
         to requiring certain cafeterias to list the gluten  content  in  foods
         being served

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The public health law is amended by adding  a  new  article
    2  44-A to read as follows:
    3                                ARTICLE 44-A
    4                      NOTICE OF GLUTEN CONTENT IN FOODS
    5  SECTION 4420. NOTICE  OF GLUTEN CONTENT IN FOODS BEING SERVED IN CAFETE-
    6                  RIAS OWNED, OPERATED OR LEASED BY THE STATE.
    7    S 4420. NOTICE OF GLUTEN CONTENT IN FOODS BEING SERVED  IN  CAFETERIAS
    8  OWNED, OPERATED OR LEASED BY THE STATE. EVERY CAFETERIA OWNED, LEASED OR
    9  OPERATED  BY  THE  STATE  SHALL  CLEARLY AND CONSPICUOUSLY POST AND MAKE
   10  AVAILABLE ALL INFORMATION REGARDING THE GLUTEN CONTENT  OF  FOODS  BEING
   11  SERVED IN SUCH CAFETERIA.
   12    S  2.  The  education  law is amended by adding a new section 355-d to
   13  read as follows:
   14    S 355-D. NOTICE OF GLUTEN CONTENT IN FOODS BEING SERVED IN  CAFETERIAS
   15  OWNED, OPERATED OR LEASED BY THE STATE. EVERY CAFETERIA OWNED, LEASED OR
   16  OPERATED BY THE STATE UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK, SHALL CLEARLY AND CONSPIC-
   17  UOUSLY  POST  AND  MAKE  AVAILABLE  ALL INFORMATION REGARDING THE GLUTEN
   18  CONTENT OF FOODS BEING SERVED IN SUCH CAFETERIA.
   19    S 3. This act shall take effect on the ninetieth day  after  it  shall
   20  have become a law.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02171-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to requiring certain cafeterias to list the gluten content in foods being served
